note: Verified algebraic equivalence 1/A >= 1/B + 1/C iff BC >= A(B+C) for A,B,C > 0. Core algebra is correct. Minor challenge filed: node does not explicitly state positivity precondition (Phi_n > 0 for n >= 2). For n >= 2, Phi_n(p) > 0 is guaranteed since p'' has degree n-2 and cannot vanish at all n simple roots. The n=1 case (Phi_1=0) is handled separately in sibling node 1.2. No critical or major issues found.
